video_prompt: A subtle, slow pan of the camera, gently gliding from left to right, revealing more of the intricate macrame design behind the figure. The loose ropes of the macrame dress and surrounding net gently sway. A very gradual, soft increase in ambient light, as if a cloud has just passed.
image_prompt: A full-body shot of a hyperrealistic bjd doll, wearing an intricate macrame dress and headpiece, against a backdrop of a macrame net. The doll has fair, unpainted skin and a serene expression, looking to the left. The macrame is a natural, light beige or cream color, with visible knots and textured ropes creating a delicate, open weave. The dress features a high neck, long sleeves, and covers only essential parts of the body, creating a revealing yet artistic look. The doll's arms and legs are wrapped with additional macrame cords. The lighting is soft and even, highlighting the texture of the macrame and the smooth surface of the doll. The overall tone is calm and elegant, with a focus on craftsmanship and ethereal beauty. "AI 生成" text in the top left corner, faded "c29" in the bottom right corner.
refined_video_prompt: Camera subtly glides left-to-right. Macrame dress ropes and net gently sway. Ambient light gradually brightens.
creative_video_prompt_1: **Violent, rapid camera zoom from left to right, blurring the intricate macrame net into streaks of light. The macrame dress violently contorts and unravels, strands whipping as if attacked by an unseen force. Simultaneously, the background net tears apart, ripping with explosive energy as ropes recoil and snap. Sudden, blinding flash of light erupts, scorching the frame white.**
creative_video_prompt_2: The macrame ropes detach from the figure, rising and swirling into a vortex, pulling the entire background net with them. The figure subtly rotates, while her skin shimmers and glows, before dissolving into a shower of living flower petals. Simultaneously, the flower petals reverse, reforming into a perfectly smooth, reflective surface, absorbing the macrame vortex into its depths.
creative_video_prompt_3: A slow, cinematic pan reveals a mannequin adorned in a macrame dress, standing amidst a swirling net of ropes. The camera subtly dollies forward, creating the illusion of a soft, ethereal dance. The gentle sway of the macrame adds an organic, almost alive quality, as if the garment itself breathes. The ambient light gradually brightens, revealing intricate details and shadows, emphasizing the delicate craftsmanship. The camera gradually rotates, revealing more of the mannequin's profile and the endless macrame beyond, creating a sense of infinite weaving.
